title: Can I find someone to write lyrics to a song? How? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, you can. Find a local venue that hosts an “open mic.” Start showing up and listening to the music. Many singer/songwriters like to showcase stuff they’ve written and use these venues. Listen, first off, to see which performers play the style of music you like-you may have to search around for a few different places. Then listen for key phrases in the between song banter. They will normally say if it’s a song they wrote, or give a personal story of the song’s inspiration. Then you need to become a regular. Joe Blow off the street isn’t as important to a performer as is a regular listener. Once you’ve established a report’ with the songwriter, most are always on the prowl for new ideas. Good Luck!
